alert_data.title: Suspicious PowerShell with Outbound Connection
alert_data.description: powershell.exe executed a base64 encoded command and connected to 1.2.3.4

alert_data.title: Admin Login from New Geolocation
alert_data.description: An administrator account logged in from an IP in a new country.

alert_data.title: Nessus Scan Detected on Internal Server
alert_data.description: Alert triggered by IDS signature for Nessus vulnerability scanner activity from 10.1.1.50 to 10.1.2.100.

expected_outcome.summary: Activity identified as authorized vulnerability scanning.
actions: Recommend adding IP 10.1.1.50 to scanner allowlist

alert_data.title: Repeated Login Failures for User 'jdoe'
alert_data.description: User account 'jdoe' failed to log in 5 times in 2 minutes from internal workstation WKS-JDOE-01 (10.10.5.25).

expected_outcome.summary: No external IoCs for automated analysis; requires internal context or user follow-up.

alert_data.title: Phishing Email Detected - Malicious Attachment
alert_data.description: User reported a phishing email with a URL to a file-sharing site and a macro-enabled Word document attachment.
